channel.title: Comments on: SQL Saturday #67 Chicago 2011 Wrap-Up
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: David Stein
item.dc:creator: David Stein
item.description: It was great to finally meet you Jes. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.
item.content:encoded: It was great to finally meet you Jes. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.description: Naomi - it was a great event! While the name "SQL Saturday" suggests it is normally held on a Saturday, I know of at least one that was held on a Friday. It's up to the team organizing it to decide on the day.
item.content:encoded: Naomi – it was a great event! While the name “SQL Saturday” suggests it is normally held on a Saturday, I know of at least one that was held on a Friday. It’s up to the team organizing it to decide on the day.

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.content:encoded:
Great event!

Wondering if there is a possibility to make it a Sunday event?

item.title: By: SQLology ~ Kim Tessereau
item.dc:creator: SQLology ~ Kim Tessereau
item.description: Awesome wrap up Jes! Okay, I'm going to start blogging....
item.content:encoded: Awesome wrap up Jes! Okay, I’m going to start blogging….

item.title: By: Tom Strike
item.dc:creator: Tom Strike
item.description: Great read Jes. I wish I could have been there but on the way to becoming a DBA I was offered a Server Admin job at IBM and have been brushing up on my server skills. I think it'll be easier to move to a DBA position from SA than from Desktop Support. Hopefully I'll make the next one. Take care. BTW, I finally fired up the slow cooker and made pork tenderloin...nomnomnomnom :-)
item.content:encoded: Great read Jes. I wish I could have been there but on the way to becoming a DBA I was offered a Server Admin job at IBM and have been brushing up on my server skills. I think it’ll be easier to move to a DBA position from SA than from Desktop Support. Hopefully I’ll make the next one. Take care. BTW, I finally fired up the slow cooker and made pork tenderloin…nomnomnomnom ðŸ™‚
